scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=frontend && npm run format --workspace=backend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist
scripts.deploy:replit: npm run build && echo 'Ready for Replit deployment'
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run test && echo 'Ready for production deployment'
